uchicago.src.repastdemos.hexabugs
Class HexaBug

java.lang.Object
  uchicago.src.repastdemos.hexabugs.HexaBug
All Implemented Interfaces:
DescriptorContainer, Drawable
public class HexaBug
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, DescriptorContainer

The agent for the HexaBugs (HeatBugs on a hexagonal space) simulation. This pretty much follows the Swarm code.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $Date: 2005/08/12 20:04:58 $
See Also:
HexaBugsModel
